Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Featured \Fea"tured\ (?; 135), a. 1. Shaped; fashioned. [1913 Webster]
How noble, young, how rarely featured! --Shak. [1913 Webster]
2. Having features; formed into features. [1913 Webster]
The well-stained canvas or the featured stone. --Young. [1913 Webster]

featured adj 1: made a feature or highlight; given prominence; "a featured actor"; "a featured item at the sale" 2: having facial features as specified; usually used in combination; "a grim-featured man"
